title: John Smith
body: 1000 milligrams (mg) of amoxicillin and 30 mg of lansoprazole, each given three times a day (every 8 hours) for 14 days.
minBody: 1000 milligrams (mg) of amoxicillin and 30 mg of lansoprazole, each given three times a day (every 8 hours) for 14 days.

title: Alicia Taylor
body: Sertraline: 50 milligrams (mg) once a day, taken either in the morning or evening
minBody: Setraline: 50 milligrams (mg) once a day, taken either in the morning or evening

title: Karen Johnson
body: Escitalopram: 10 milligrams (mg) once a day for 12 days.
minBody: Escitalopram: 10 milligrams (mg) once a day for 12 days.

title: Daniel Frank
body: Quetiapine: 200 milligrams (mg) every night with a full glass of water.
minBody: Quetiapine: 200 milligrams (mg) every night with a full glass of water.
